post.body: He is but he told me he was at Tucson mall today
Thanks for the KB tip
Tucson Mall. To say hi to @cartoonlad and buy games.
Yes. Most will be multiple choice, but there is an essay question.
Finally, he gets an avatar!
As for Ep2, I had my first heart attack scare (panick attack) 20 min into the film so it hold a special place on my sh!t list.
although she is in very good health. But she's a rare breed, so I need pics to show people what a Belgian Goat Terrier is.
I need more/better pictures of Petunia. She's 8 and a large dog, so... need more pics while I can.
My wife likes to unwrap presents, that's a lot of the fun for her, so I wrap.
Music torture? Like putting a karaoke machine in the terminal at the Houston airport?
Presents dropped at mother-in-law's. Now off to the mall to buy me toys.
Since wife is working tomorrow. we're doing Boxing Day instead on Friday.
My little red car is packed full of presents like Santa's hooptie beater sleigh. Off to mother-in-law's.
Belgian Goat Terriers are actually afraid of small animals such as squirrels and cats. It's characteristic of the breed.
Due to its rarity, the Belgian Goat Terrier is not a breed recognized by the AKC.
The name "Belgian Goat Terrier" was given by American breeders circa 1879. The Basque name for the breed is "chien".
The "goat" and "terrier" bit comes from the little beards they have, similar to billygoats and terriers.
Belgian Goat Terriers are also not terriers at all, but herd dogs. And they were bred to herd sheep, not goats.
The name Belgian Goat Terrier is a gross misnomer. First, they're not Belgian, but were first bred by Basque shepherds.
9 Other Things That Happened Christmas Day http://www.mentalfloss.com/blogs/archives/21233
